requires_datamodel.body:
requires_datamodel 
	# list of datamodel details 

end

body:
${1:PRODUCT NAME} ${2|layered_product,customisation_product,config_product|}

title
	# TITLE
$3
end

requires
	# List of required products
$4
end

version	 ${5|5.2.0.0-001,5.1.0.0-001,5.0.0.0-001,4.3.0.0-001,4.2.0.0-001,4.1.0.0-001|}

case_installation
	# list of case_installations
end

style_installation
	# list of style_installations
end

ace_installation
	# list of ace_installations
end

system_installation
	# list of system_installations
end

auth_installation
	# list of auth_installations
end

${1:<alias>}:
	title          = #--- title ---
	directory      = #--- directory ---
	program        = #--- program ---
	splash_screen  = #--- image file, e.g. mysplash.gif ---
	session        = #--- product:name ---
	java           = #--- pathname of Java executable ---
	java_log       = #--- file ---
	script         = #--- command ---
	osgi_directory = #--- directory ---
	args           = #--- args ---
	log_file       = #--- file ---
	timeout        = #--- seconds ---
	wait_line      = #--- text ---
	interactive    = #--- interactive_or_not ---
